news.title: Lunar New Years Sale!
news.body:
## Happy Lunar New Years!
We here at Astro Games are thrilled to announce a sale in celebration of the year of the Rabbit, take a look at all discounts available here
In game **La Tale**
- **30%** off dragon themed items
- **new** rabbit emblem
- **new** rabbit cloak
- **removed** all unnecessary predators

Looking forward to seeing everyone in game, we've seen more players than ever in the **US-east** region, so they're getting **double xp** weekend!
